snippet: Mr. Abdeslam, the sole surviving assailant from the Nov. 13 terrorist assaults, has remained silent and has indicated that he no longer wants representation....
lead_paragraph: Mr. Abdeslam, the sole surviving assailant from the Nov. 13 terrorist assaults, has remained silent and has indicated that he no longer wants representation.

headline.main: Lawyers for Salah Abdeslam, Suspect in Paris Attacks, Resign
headline.print_headline: Lawyers Quit Representing Suspect in Paris Attacks
